string.value: Took Jay's advice and visited Mrs. Ming Ming to ask about Alloy, the author of Legend of the Snail. She said her grandfather's latest letter was about #bWing the Fairy of Ellinia#k, and suggested I go see Wing.
Wing the Fairy recalls Alloy as the human who obtained Mano's shell and prolonged his lifespan. Let's ask some more questions.

I'm busy with preparing for the festival, so please make it quick. What? You're talking about great-grandfather Alloy? Did he get himself into trouble? Phew... that's a relief. It's good to know he is healthy and all, but he sometimes gets into trouble while traveling around the sea.
I don't know where he is now, because he moves around too much looking for adventures. However, I do have a letter sent from him to me recently. I can show you the letter to you if you'd like.

It seems he is in #bEllinia#k now. Apparently, he boasted in his letter that he became friends with #bWing the Fairy#k. Therefore, he has to be in Ellinia with Wing the Fairy. But then again, he does move around a lot, so he may have left Ellinia already.
Don't blame you if you don't what to know. Could you please move over so I can continue preparing for the festival?
What... are you? Aren't you human? What's your business here? What? You're asking about Alloy?!

How can't I NOT know him?! Every fairy in Ellinia knows him! Don't matter if it's good or bad! He's such a disgusting human! He has a loud voice, too talkative, and he puts his nose into everything he can bug into!

Hmm... but he wasn't a bad person at all. Quite funny, in a... strange, sort of way. Underneath the fuss, he was intelligent and wise also. I've heard he got #bMano's Shell#k. Maybe the shell that made him like that? Still, he was a fair guy for a human being.
Huh? You don't know what Mano's Shell is? It's the shell of the longest-living snail in Maple World. It's special for its rainbow color. What? You want to see Mano itself? Well... but what for?
You haven't met #bWing the Fairy#k yet, haven't you? You don't have to if you don't want to.
What are your intentions here in the fairy forest, human?
